summary: In the vein of the Review Studio, I\'ve created another mod that aims to do the same, but with a bit more...Nordic flavor. It\'s essentially a large, Nordic ruin-esque room to try out and review new mods, from weapons to spells to npcs. Hope you enjoy it!
descriptionHtml:
In the vein of the Review Studio, I\'ve created another mod that aims to do the same, but with a bit more...Nordic flavor. It\'s essentially a large, Nordic ruin-esque room to try out and review new mods, from weapons to spells to npcs. Hope you enjoy it!
As this is my first mod, please excuse any choppy animations in the walls, etc. I hope to release an update soon to remedy that. 
HOW TO USE IT: In a normal game, type \"coc TestingArena\" into the console and you will be teleported there. I recommend making a save before, as anything might happen, ya never know... :D
author: Ezio9heAssassin
